verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> ve-'El-leh these הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <WH4941> ham-mish-pa-Tim, Now these [are] the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תָּשִׂ֖ים <WH7760> ta-Sim which thou shalt set לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem. before

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki If תִקְנֶה֙ <WH7069> tik-Neh If thou buy עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> 'E-ved servant עִבְרִ֔י <WH5680> 'iv-Ri, an Hebrew שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> shesh six שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> sha-Nim years יַעֲבֹ֑ד <WH5647> ya-'a-Vod; he shall serve וּבַ֨שְּׁבִעִ֔ת <WH7637> u-Vash-she-vi-'It, and in the seventh יֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> ye-Tze he shall go out לַֽחָפְשִׁ֖י <WH2670> la-cha-fe-Shi free חִנָּֽם׃ <WH2600> chin-Nam. for nothing

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If בְּגַפּ֥וֹ <WH1610> be-gap-Po by himself יָבֹ֖א <WH935> ya-Vo If he came in בְּגַפּ֣וֹ <WH1610> be-gap-Po by himself יֵצֵ֑א <WH3318> ye-Tze; he shall go out אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if בַּ֤עַל <WH1167> Ba-'al is the husband אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> 'ish-Shah then his wife ה֔וּא <WH1931> Hu, he וְיָצְאָ֥ה <WH3318> ve-ya-tze-'Ah shall go out אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> ish-To his wife עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> im-Mo. with

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If אֲדֹנָיו֙ <WH113> 'a-do-Nav If his master יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> yit-ten- have given ל֣וֹ lo אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah, him a wife וְיָלְדָה־ <WH3205> ve-Yal-dah- and she have born ל֥וֹ lo בָנִ֖ים <WH1121> va-Nim him sons א֣וֹ <WH176> o or בָנ֑וֹת <WH1323> va-Not; or daughters הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> ha-'ish-Shah the wife וִילָדֶ֗יהָ <WH3206> vi-la-Dei-ha, and her children תִּהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> tih-Yeh shall belong לַֽאדֹנֶ֔יהָ <WH113> la-do-Nei-ha, shall be her master's וְה֖וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu and he יֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> ye-Tze and he shall go out בְגַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH1610> ve-gap-Po. by himself

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if אָמֹ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mor shall plainly יֹאמַר֙ <WH559> yo-Mar say הָעֶ֔בֶד <WH5650> ha-'E-ved, And if the servant אָהַ֙בְתִּי֙ <WH157> 'a-Hav-ti I love אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> 'a-do-Ni, my master אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH802> 'ish-Ti my wife וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּנָ֑י <WH1121> ba-Nai; and my children לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo I will not אֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> 'e-Tze I will not go out חָפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH2670> cha-fe-Shi. free

וְהִגִּישׁ֤וֹ <WH5066> ve-hig-gi-Sho shall bring אֲדֹנָיו֙ <WH113> 'a-do-Nav Then his master אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, him unto the judges וְהִגִּישׁוֹ֙ <WH5066> ve-hig-gi-Sho he shall also bring אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַדֶּ֔לֶת <WH1817> had-De-let, him to the door א֖וֹ <WH176> o or אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַמְּזוּזָ֑ה <WH4201> ham-me-zu-Zah; or unto the door post וְרָצַ֨ע <WH7527> ve-ra-Tza' shall bore אֲדֹנָ֤יו <WH113> 'a-do-Nav and his master אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָזְנוֹ֙ <WH241> a-ze-No his ear בַּמַּרְצֵ֔עַ <WH4836> bam-mar-Tze-a', through with an aul וַעֲבָד֖וֹ <WH5647> va-'a-va-Do and he shall serve לְעֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> le-'o-Lam. him for ever ס sa-Mek

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> ve-chi- If יִמְכֹּ֥ר <WH4376> yim-Kor sell אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> 'ish And if a man אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בִּתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> bit-To his daughter לְאָמָ֑ה <WH519> le-'a-Mah; to be a maidservant לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo is not תֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> te-Tze she shall not go out כְּצֵ֥את <WH3318> ke-Tzet do הָעֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> ha-'a-va-Dim. as the menservants

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If רָעָ֞ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah is displeasing בְּעֵינֵ֧י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei the eyes אֲדֹנֶ֛יהָ <WH113> 'a-do-Nei-ha not her master אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who; לֹא lo כלֹ֥ו <WH3808> Lo not קיְעָדָ֖הּ <WH3259> ye-'a-Dah who hath betrothed וְהֶפְדָּ֑הּ <WH6299> ve-hef-Dah; her to himself then shall he let her be redeemed לְעַ֥ם <WH5971> le-'Am nation נָכְרִ֛י <WH5237> na-che-Ri her unto a strange לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- does not יִמְשֹׁ֥ל <WH4910> yim-Shol he shall have no power לְמָכְרָ֖הּ <WH4376> le-ma-che-Rah to sell בְּבִגְדוֹ־ <WH898> be-vig-dov- seeing he hath dealt deceitfully בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- If לִבְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> liv-No her unto his son יִֽיעָדֶ֑נָּה <WH3259> yi-'a-Den-nah; And if he have betrothed כְּמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <WH4941> ke-mish-Pat with her after the manner הַבָּנ֖וֹת <WH1323> hab-ba-Not of daughters יַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> ya-'a-seh- he shall deal לָּֽהּ׃ Lah.

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If אַחֶ֖רֶת <WH312> 'a-Che-ret him another יִֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> yik-kach- If he take ל֑וֹ lo; שְׁאֵרָ֛הּ <WH7607> she-'e-Rah [wife] her food כְּסוּתָ֥הּ <WH3682> ke-su-Tah her raiment וְעֹנָתָ֖הּ <WH5772> ve-'o-na-Tah and her duty of marriage לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo may not יִגְרָֽע׃ <WH1639> yig-Ra'. shall he not diminish

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- If שְׁלָ֨שׁ־ <WH7969> she-Lash- not these three אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh, these לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo he will not יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> ya-'a-Seh And if he do לָ֑הּ Lah; וְיָצְאָ֥ה <WH3318> ve-ya-tze-'Ah unto her then shall she go out חִנָּ֖ם <WH2600> chin-Nam free אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein without כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> Ka-sef. without money ס sa-Mek
מַכֵּ֥ה <WH5221> mak-Keh He that smiteth אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> 'ish a man וָמֵ֖ת <WH4191> va-Met so that he die מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Mot shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> yu-Mat. put to death

וַאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> va-'a-Sher if לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo did not צָדָ֔ה <WH6658> tza-Dah, And if a man lie not in wait וְהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ve-ha-'E-lo-Him but God אִנָּ֣ה <WH579> 'in-Nah deliver לְיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> le-ya-Do; [him] into his hand וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <WH7760> ve-sam-Ti then I will appoint לְךָ֙ le-Cha מָק֔וֹם <WH4725> ma-Kom, thee a place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher to which יָנ֖וּס <WH5127> ya-Nus whither he shall flee שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> Sham-mah. in it ס sa-Mek

וְכִי־ <WH3588> ve-chi- If יָזִ֥ד <WH2102> ya-Zid come presumptuously אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> 'ish But if a man עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- toward רֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> re-'E-hu upon his neighbour לְהָרְג֣וֹ <WH2026> le-ha-re-Go to slay בְעָרְמָ֑ה <WH6195> ve-'a-re-Mah; him with guile מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> me-'Im him from מִזְבְּחִ֔י <WH4196> miz-be-Chi, him from mine altar תִּקָּחֶ֖נּוּ <WH3947> tik-ka-Chen-nu thou shalt take לָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> la-Mut. that he may die ס sa-Mek
וּמַכֵּ֥ה <WH5221> u-mak-Keh And he that smiteth אָבִ֛יו <WH1> 'a-Viv his father וְאִמּ֖וֹ <WH517> ve-'im-Mo or his mother מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Mot shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> yu-Mat. put to death

וְגֹנֵ֨ב <WH1589> ve-go-Nev And he that stealeth אִ֧ישׁ <WH376> 'ish a man וּמְכָר֛וֹ <WH4376> u-me-cha-Ro and selleth וְנִמְצָ֥א <WH4672> ve-nim-Tza him or if he be found בְיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> ve-ya-Do in his hand מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Mot he shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> yu-Mat. be put to death ס sa-Mek

וּמְקַלֵּ֥ל <WH7043> u-me-kal-Lel And he that curseth אָבִ֛יו <WH1> 'a-Viv his father וְאִמּ֖וֹ <WH517> ve-'im-Mo or his mother מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Mot shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> yu-Mat. be put to death ס sa-Mek

[his] bed

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if יָק֞וּם <WH6965> ya-Kum If he rise again וְהִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> ve-hit-hal-Lech and walk בַּח֛וּץ <WH2351> ba-Chutz abroad עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on מִשְׁעַנְתּ֖וֹ <WH4938> mish-'an-To upon his staff וְנִקָּ֣ה <WH5352> ve-nik-Kah [him] be quit הַמַּכֶּ֑ה <WH5221> ham-mak-Keh; then shall he that smote רַ֥ק <WH7535> rak but שִׁבְתּ֛וֹ <WH7674> shiv-To [for] the loss of his time יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> yit-Ten only he shall pay וְרַפֹּ֥א <WH7495> ve-rap-Po and shall cause [him] to be thoroughly יְרַפֵּֽא׃ <WH7495> ye-rap-Pe. healed ס sa-Mek

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> ve-chi- If יַכֶּה֩ <WH5221> yak-Keh smite אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> 'ish And if a man אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַבְדּ֜וֹ <WH5650> av-Do his servant א֤וֹ <WH176> o or אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲמָתוֹ֙ <WH519> a-ma-To or his maid בַּשֵּׁ֔בֶט <WH7626> bash-She-vet, with a rod וּמֵ֖ת <WH4191> u-Met and he die תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat Thahash יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do; under his hand נָקֹ֖ם <WH5358> na-Kom he shall be surely יִנָּקֵֽם׃ <WH5358> yin-na-Kem. punished

אַ֥ךְ <WH389> 'ach Notwithstanding אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If י֛וֹם <WH3117> Yom a day א֥וֹ <WH176> o or יוֹמַ֖יִם <WH3117> yo-Ma-yim A day יַעֲמֹ֑ד <WH5975> ya-'a-Mod; if he continue לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo no יֻקַּ֔ם <WH5358> yuk-Kam, he shall not be punished כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for כַסְפּ֖וֹ <WH3701> chas-Po for he [is] his money הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he ס sa-Mek

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if אָס֖וֹן <WH611> a-Son And if [any] mischief follow יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh; become וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Tah then thou shalt give נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh life תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat Thahash נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> Na-fesh. for life

עַ֚יִן <WH5869> 'A-yin Eye תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat Thahash עַ֔יִן <WH5869> 'A-yin, for eye שֵׁ֖ן <WH8127> shen tooth תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat Thahash שֵׁ֑ן <WH8127> Shen; for tooth יָ֚ד <WH3027> yad hand תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat Thahash יָ֔ד <WH3027> Yad, for hand רֶ֖גֶל <WH7272> Re-gel foot תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat Thahash רָֽגֶל׃ <WH7272> Ra-gel. for foot
